page.title: 12THE PUB IN ELPHINSTONE
page.content: THE PUB, THE ELPHINSTONE INN, IS OWNED BY MR.WILLIAM THOMSON.THE PUB MADE Â£103.00 FOR THE SCHOOL FUNDS AND PLANTED FLOWERS FOR THE SCHOOL TOO.IT OPENS AT 1.00pm AND CLOSES AT 3.00pm.AT NIGHT IT OPENS AT 6.30pm AND CLOSES AT 11.30. YOU HAVE TO BE OVER 18 TO GET IN.IT'S MOSTLY MEN WHO GO BUT THE PUB ISN'T FULL EVERY NIGHT.THERE IS A SNOOKER TABLE AND DART BOARD.THERE ARE DIFFERENT PEOPLE WORKING ON DIFFERENT NIGHTS.THE PUB SELLS SNACKS.THERE IS HARDLY ANY ROOM TO HAVE A BAND OR A DISCO.IN THE PUB THERE IS A BANDIT. THE PUB HAS A VIDEO AND TELEVISION. SOME NIGHTS THEY WATCH VIDEOS,THE MOST POPULAR ARE OF THE COMEDEDIAN HECTOR NICHOLS.IN THE PUB THERE IS A FISH TANK WITH SOME GOLDFISH IN IT.THE PUB HAS AN OPEN FIRE WHICH BURNS LOGS AND COAL.
